Group (2021-2022):

Introduction

Leo is a Korean-Australian singer. He made his solo debut with the digital single "One Look" on August 17, 2023.

Before joining 131 Online as a soloist, Leo was known as a former trainee of BIGHIT Music and a member of the now-disbanded Trainee A. He also appeared in BTS' "Permission to Dance" music video alongside NewJeans Hanni and Minji.
